title: Three resistors connected in parallel with battery

content.question:
Three resistors having resistances of 3 Ω, 6 Ω, and 9 Ω, respectively, are connected in parallel with a 10 V battery. True statements about the circuit include which of the following? 

I. The current in the 9 Ω resistor is three times the current in the 3 Ω resistor. 

II. The potential difference across each resistor is the same. 

III. The power dissipated in the 9 Ω resistor is greater than the power dissipated in either of the other two resistors.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
